alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 3:12PM MST until February 21 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 PM MST MONDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, mainly western facing slopes. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet possible with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...Central Mountains and Southern Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 AM to 11 PM MST Monday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Expect winter driving conditions on mountain routes including higher passes on I-15 and I-70 during both the advisory and the watch periods.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
